name: Exo Diver
description:
Relax, explore, and unravel the mystery.

Exo Diver is a small but immersive open world, puzzling scifi adventure. Explore the underwater realm of an alien planet, collect valuable resources for the corporation, and investigate mysterious alien technology.

The gameplay is light on puzzling with the emphasis on relaxing exploration in simple but atmospheric 2.5D. Enjoy full freedom to find your own path at your own pace with no hand holding.

Feedback Wanted

This is intended as a small prototype. Feedback is very helpful. Please leave a comment below.

  • What did you like?
  • What seems missing?
  • What needs improvement?

Live streaming and let's plays are welcome and encouraged. Commentary is preferred, but feedback in any form is appreciated.
